website_summaries.verdict: A set of ceramic knives that are as enjoyable to use as they are to look at.
pros: Manufactured by a trusted brand, this set of ceramic knives make for a great gift given the price, quality, and look
We love that the colors have culinary purpose as well in term of use
Should work well after several months
cons: Customers note they wish the knives were a bit sharper all around

customer_reviews.title: BROKE WITHIN 1 MONTH.
customer_reviews.text: One of the knives broke after a couple weeks. Amazon doesn't accept returns.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty McBride

customer_reviews.title: SHARP!
customer_reviews.text: The look, the colors, and man, the blades! Be careful and do not allow children to use these knives on any level. They are like razors--but excellent in the kitchen. The colors are great for glancing and finding exactly the knife you need for a specific job. They clean easily and seem to be keeping their edges. Depending on the occasion, they can make a useful gift for any aspiring Top Chef.
customer_reviews.author: Darsen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Quality
customer_reviews.text: We had an old set of similar knives I'd purchased a few years ago, and they were ready to be moved into the camping stuff. I bought these to replace my daily use knives, and I just adore them! Excellent blade variety for all your cutting needs, sharp as can be, and just pretty. I do not hand wash them, even though I know that if I want a longer life from them I should, but so far, after months of use, they're just as perfect as the day I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather J

customer_reviews.title: SHARP!
customer_reviews.text: Have had these knives for about 6 months, and use them regularly for all sorts of veggie chopping, and meat slicing and they remain sharp. They are actually extremely sharp, and in fact, I cut part of the top of my thumb off, as the blade of the smallest knife went right through the nail and flesh of my finger. I love these knives, and after a couple of cuts, I am very careful when using and cleaning them. Definitely recommend, as I am gifting some for Christmas. Be VERY careful with these and keep the blade guards on whenever not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Guiza

customer_reviews.title: Love these knives!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had these knives for a couple of months at our cabin and love them. They still look brand new. They are VERY sharp! I’ve barely touched them to my skin and have gotten small cuts, so be careful. They slice through everything very easily including streak, watermelon, bread, etc and are great for chopping herbs. They haven’t dulled at all. We do hand wash them and dry them completely before putting them back in the sheaths. My dad used the red one to clean fish twice recently and he won’t stop talking about these knives. We’re going to get him a set as a gift. We’re also going to buy another set for our home as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: High quality.  SHARP!  Easy care
customer_reviews.text: These high-quality knives are easy care - dishwasher safe! I’ve been impressed with their ability to maintain a sharp cutting edge after multiple uses and dishwasher cleanings. Each has a safety sheath, which serves to protect the cutting edge from damage as well as accidental nicking of casual cooks. These dudes are SHARP! Reasonably priced. Durable! Different blades have varied bright colors to distinguish.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great knives, very sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new knives! I love the fresh colors, and these knives are sharp! Just be aware...they're also a bit larger than normal. They wouldn't fit into my antique knife block...so I had to purchase another block with larger spaces. But still very happy with these! Be careful...these are super sharp.
customer_reviews.author: C. Le Blanc

customer_reviews.title: The Best.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best!! I have a set and they are my favorite knives. I buy a set whenever they are on special buy and keep them to give as gifts. They make wonderful wedding, housewarming, birthday or Christmas gifts. It's so nice to be able to give someone a gift of superior quality that is aesthetically pleasing and very useful.
customer_reviews.author: B. Raborn

customer_reviews.title: The handles are too big.  They're made for larger hands.
customer_reviews.text: My hand cramps when using the parting knife especially. I wear medium to small gloves. My hands are too small for this set of knives. Never knew this mattered since I use my set of wooden handle Chicago cutlery, my Susuki chefs knife and my expensive German set Walsedorf (sic) with ease. This Cuisinart set has larger handles, can't use the paring knife at all. My husband has no problem, guess who's going to use these knives??!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Impress
customer_reviews.text: Very shape and easy to clean, had mine about a month and I love them. I was very impressed with them. Knifes made by other companies which claim to be stainless devolve rust spots in a short time, so much for Chinese metals.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, fun & well made knives!
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled with these knives. I had my doubts, considering they aren't expensive. However, they happily surprised me. The variety of knives hits all that I need.. in addition to some nicer knives I already had. The blades are incredibly sharp, and each knife comes with its own blade sheath. The ceramic coating is holding up very well, except on the small pairing knife.. which the color wore off the tip. Oddly the larger knives that I use the most, show no sign of the ceramic coating wearing off. I wanted a pop of color in my kitchen and these are perfect. I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice knifes but they don't stay sharp very long
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: They're sharp and I love the variety of knives this set comes with
customer_reviews.text: These really work! They're cute and colorful but most of all they work extremely well. They're sharp and I love the variety of knives this set comes with. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow_Sloth

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves these knives!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I initially bought these knives because I loved the colors; however, now they are the only ones we use. We've had several expensive brands over the years, but these are excellent for the price. I gave this set for Christmas gifts, and everyone that received them has loved them.
customer_reviews.author: amiller

customer_reviews.title: Great set!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set to start with or just to add to what you have. Color coding allows you to use only one knife for it's purpose, ie. red for meat, green for veggies, yellow for bread. Super sharp! I'm a month in and they are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Chase

customer_reviews.title: Horrible...so DULL!
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised...these were very dull knives on receipt! I mean DULL! ALAS, some very nice person (no names) in my family decided to sharpen them for me before they knew I was returning them...er...thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Chickpea

customer_reviews.title: value for money
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly. Well packed. I used only 3 of it but its really great. Easy to use, no hassle. Easy to clean. Perfect for my day to day stuff.
customer_reviews.author: JYGBOY

customer_reviews.title: Great Product / Good Quality & Value
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Paid around $15 so great valie. We hand wash them and they are holding up great with almost daily use. Like the protective sleeves - can toss them in a drawer without harming the blade. Would make a great gift also!
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best knives ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these knives. My hubby and I actual cut extra stuff just so we have a chance to use them longer.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Mish

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp knives with vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: The knives are very sharp and come with a protective sleeve. They are perfect to display on a magnetic block. They retain their sharpness for months and do not fade when sharpened.
customer_reviews.author: Jalé

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and good quality
customer_reviews.text: The colors are a great addition to any kitchen. You of course need to have a knife sharpener but with that they'll stay sharp for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are not nearly as sharp as other ceramics I've ...
customer_reviews.text: They are not nearly as sharp as other ceramics I've used. The color is already coming off, I've only used them a half dozen times :-(
customer_reviews.author: FMH

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are wonderful - very well made just like everything Cuisinart does. They came right on time. are easy to use and clean and even better than we expected!
customer_reviews.author: hooves

customer_reviews.title: Out witht he old - great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Only slightly disappointed that these aren't as sharp as our Japanese ceramic knives, but they're good enough to replace the out-of-control proliferation of assorted knives that were taking up a lot of space and not being used.
customer_reviews.author: XOXOXO

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use them, did return them. Just didn't like once I actually saw them. Just the colors, a little too bright for me.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Dreams

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Excellent knives. Very sharp, handles make them comfortable to use, clean up easily and the colors are great.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: GREAT set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this set as a gift for my cousin for Christmas. She says she loves them as much as I do! They are very sharp and can go in the dishwasher. I don’t wash the covers unless I have to, though since they are plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful in person and work well for all your chopping and slicing needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will love these knives too
customer_reviews.text: My husband really loves these knives. I love the colors. They are sharp and cuts through the food that needs to be cut with no issues. I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: I will buy from him again
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel nice. Price was reasonable and very pleased with seller. I give 5 stars. These were gifts and the people loved them.. Very pleased with this seller..
customer_reviews.author: Joan Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value. Very Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp & easy to use. Warning. They are so sharp its easy to cut yourself tho. My girlfriend has cut herself 3 times. Otherwise vety great knife set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to split with my mom and she loves her three knives (the smaller ones). Very sharp and has a comfortable grip. Great colors too. We’re both happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LPinTX

customer_reviews.title: Great knives!
customer_reviews.text: An inexpensive alternative to cutlery. Handles have a good feel. They are sharp, hold an edge well and are easy to sharpen. The color matched blade covers help protect the blades and allow drawer storage. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: R King

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are a good starter knife pack. & love the colors. Great gift idea. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several sets of these knives. I give them as gifts often. I have many different knives and some are very expensive brands. These are my favorite by far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, lifetime warranty!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product. Smart, sleek, sharp yet practical! Affordable so that you can gift yourself as well as a friend.
customer_reviews.author: SuBee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BE FOOLED
customer_reviews.text: Do no't be fooled by the photo of 12 knives - There are 6 knives and 6 knife covers.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Love these knives!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and stays sharp. The color came off of the green blade but did not hinder the use.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and they stay that way!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical about ceramic knifes in general and I’ve used some not so nice ones for sure- but these have held up well and are still nice and sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey G. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Don't pass these by...great knife set.
customer_reviews.text: Totally fabulous kitchen tools. I am giving them to each family on my Christmas list and for the neighbors who watch my kitties when I'm away. They are sharp! Color coded.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best knives I've ever owned so gifted them for Xmas to my mother in law. I wish I could trust then in the dishwasher, but have lost many a good knife that way so hand washing is all I do for these babies and they are AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Caster

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! The blades are colored and so cute. Knives work great!!! My son bought these for his wife and I saw them and wanted to buy them so I did! I haven't been disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: KBottom

customer_reviews.title: This will be the last set of knives you buy.
customer_reviews.text: I provided this as a gift to my wife after she was always complaining about the sharpness of our knives. She loves them. The coloring system is a great selling point also. She has since thrown out all other kitchen knives.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: A big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for Christmas. Was cutting through pork chops n the knife warped. These were not hard bones either so I’m very surprised on how the knife blade bent so easily.
customer_reviews.author: AIDA BERMUDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great knives
customer_reviews.text: Love the colorful sleeves for the knives. They are super sharp so be careful!
customer_reviews.author: julie n

customer_reviews.title: Color comes off
customer_reviews.text: Love the covering .. Don’t like how the color comes off the knives
customer_reviews.author: Coot

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors 🌈
customer_reviews.text: Very nice knife worth the price. I would order them again perfect for gifts. The colors are beautiful too.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Maricela Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Sharpe and stable..the covers are definitely a plus
customer_reviews.text: Unbelieable. These are very sharp..the set would serve me better if it had a couple more smaller knives. Needs a 5 inch blade..maybe 6 ...
customer_reviews.author: barbara smith

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: These actually make cooking fun ! I love having colorful knives in my drawer it looks adorable and encourages me to cook. The knives are super sharp and easy to use and comes with the perfect assortment of shapes for different foods.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: They worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to meal prep for a party and found that it was so easy to use. The smooth edges were very much necessary for the many different uses. The sharp blade made cutting and chopping a breeze. Thanks for the prompt delivery of the item and I would definitely recommend it to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Empress Maxine

customer_reviews.title: I like the colors
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I like the colors, but I wish I could sharpen them. Started out OK on tomatoes, not so much anymore.
customer_reviews.author: 4theLoveofDOGS

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased ceramic knives before and these are very nice. Good assortment, very sharp
customer_reviews.author: Anna C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift but my friend loved it...She have been wanting to get a set but never did.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty

customer_reviews.title: These are my favs. My only wish? Is ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my favs. My only wish? Is that the knife itself had the name on them or at least there guards i.e: Bread knife.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and cut amazingly. However, not sure what is used to give them those colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool colors and love the guard for each knife which is very sharpe.
customer_reviews.author: puka18

customer_reviews.title: Not the right product
customer_reviews.text: Umm i got 2 bread knifes and no utility knife...hmmm??
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine gifted these knives to me over a year ago, so I bought a set for my sister for Christmas and she loves them. Super easy to clean and work with. Great value for the product price.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Cooking made it easy! these work so well
customer_reviews.text: Cooking made it easy! these work so well! only thing is i wish you guys put the uses on the actual knife instead of just a paper. Update: April 2020: ALL my knives are still in good condition. No peeling, none are broken.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: expected them to be sharp they are ok
customer_reviews.text: bought them for outside kitchen not very sharp had hoped they would be
customer_reviews.author: Jack yarborough

customer_reviews.title: Sharpness
customer_reviews.text: These knives are the most used in the house .they hold a sharp edge and easily identified by color.
customer_reviews.author: David Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they are great! Love the matching sleeves, so easy to keep up with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved them so much bought them twice!
customer_reviews.text: Had them for about a month and ended up buying a set for my mom! Much better than the old sets that we had. I can even cut bacon now! I just wish they came with a fun knife block!
customer_reviews.author: jkennedy

customer_reviews.title: Good Set!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these knifes. I've had them for about 8 months now. Still no rusting, and super sharp. I love the blade covers, and the colors are fantastic. I use them often, but not for prep with every meal. For the most part I hand wash them, and dry right away in fear they may rust. A handful of times I have washed them in the dishwasher and just made sure to dry them well before putting the blade covers back on. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Casey M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and sharp
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe these are so sharp and pretty for how little I spent!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Anne Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Best knifes
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these knifes, and you can not beat the price for these on Amazon. Would buy again when these wear out. Wife loves the colors of theses knifes and loves the way they cut, so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Lost edges too soon
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased initially as they were sharp but lost their edges very fast.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These knives are better than sex! I feel like a ninja in kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wood

customer_reviews.title: and they cut terrific.
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that they are sharp, seem to hold their edge, and they cut terrific.
customer_reviews.author: hokenrr

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not very sharp. They’re attractive but you get what you pay for in this case
customer_reviews.author: Michele Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Order was not right
customer_reviews.text: I like the knives but received 2 bread knives instead of the light blue slicing knife.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ochis

customer_reviews.title: Great buy - Great price!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are awesome, really nice colors and I love that the come with sheaths. Cuts through everything like its butter.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Slice and dice anything and everything, meat...veggies, super sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set, though I wish there were a couple of the smaller knives, however, it was a super great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Woolard

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: They are very sharp be careful I really like them would order again
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: the knives worked great, cut through anything at ease
customer_reviews.text: the knives worked great, cut through anything at ease...bought the set for a friend for xmas, the knives are getting dull and don't cut like they used to or should considering they are ceramic, they literally have to saw and put effort into cutting things.
customer_reviews.author: johnny au

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: covers a bit hard to put back on but great knives.
customer_reviews.author: Sue B

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these knives, cut vegetables like you are cutting butter. I need a set that is smaller as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kollhopp

customer_reviews.title: They are great, they look really good and are very sharp
customer_reviews.text: They are great, they look really good and are very sharp. So far I had only used 3 of them but they worked great.
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: nice set of knives
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of ceramic coated knives. Gave 2 away as gifts. Cuts clean without sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F. Rogal

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sharp. Wonderful way to add color to your food prep area. The colors pop!
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: loose handle
customer_reviews.text: The knives work well but one arrived already loose from the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on knifes!! These knifes cut really well and wash off easily!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Tyrrell

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: I got these from a big box store originally. I liked them so much I got some for my grandparents on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. After few months my knifes have already rust on them and I've always hand wash them!
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I like the quality but it is not ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I like the quality but it is not that sharp. The set has same knives in different colors. instead of having same sizes i wish there were different sizes of knives.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, cut myself with the purple one on accident and had to get a finger full of stitches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just an average product from cusunart.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good item to buy. It's coating goes away faster. Just 3 weeks now already coating of 2 knives started going. Sharpness is also just average.
customer_reviews.author: Cijin

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but rusts after every wash...
customer_reviews.text: They are really nice knives, until you wash them... They all started to rust after just the first wash. If you sharpen them before each use, the rust goes away, since it is just on the silver non-coated edge of the knives, but that is a bit of a hassle when you just want to make dinner. They would be perfect if not for that...
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Small knives do fine.
customer_reviews.text: No real impressed with larger knives sharpness. Small knives do fine.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly did not realize how dull me knives were till I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Heinrichs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this set, they are my go to knives. match my fiestaware
customer_reviews.author: Gary Pinholster

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome set or knives. Just know that they are only ceramic coated. While they are extremely sharp, they may still require sharpening over time. The weight of these are great and they seem well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond A. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these knives are pretty sharp. Don't know how long they will last or stay that way. They are somewhat light, would be nicer if the larger carving knife had more heft to it but it doesn't. So far these are a decent value and I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: mdisher

customer_reviews.title: Best knives I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the more vibrant colors and absolutely love them! I've had them for 18 months and they're still working great! I bought this set as a gift for my brother & sister in law and they absolutely love them too! My sister in law said quote "these have changed my life!" Be careful not to cut yourself, as they are extremely sharp! This link will take you to the absolute BEST knife I've EVER bought!!!! I've owned it for over 2 years now! It's still as sharp as the day I bought it! Make sure to purchase a blade protector if you purchase this baby! I went with the Messermeister 6" Chef's Edge-Guard & love it!
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: but these are good enough to get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Iʻd give it more of a 4.5/5. For the price, theyʻre incredible. I have used sharper knives, but these are good enough to get the job done. Iʻve been using them for a couple months now and have no complaints. I have a woodblock from an old set of old, dull knives, and I just put most of these in the block, rather than back in the sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: a. ann

customer_reviews.title: Missing Knives in the box
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered along with other three items in a big box by Amazon. From outside the knife set looks complete and untouched, but when I opened it, there was only 1 knife in the box instead of 6.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Yoon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A real value. Knives have a nice weight to them. Feel like a quality knife. Also the color coding is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: DaveR

customer_reviews.title: These Knives Look Great!
customer_reviews.text: Knives look nice, but have not used since we are building a new house. Just stocking up.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my kids for Christmas and they were well received
customer_reviews.author: Amazongirl

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic Coated
customer_reviews.text: I wanted ceramic- these were coated - not the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

product_meta.title: Cuisinart C55-12PCER1 Advantage Color Collection 12-Piece Knife Set with Blade Guards, Multicolored
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1This 12-Piece set includes an, 8" Chef Knife, 8" Slicing Knife, 8" Bread Knife, 7" Santoku Knife, 6.5" Utility Knife, 3.5" Paring Knife and each knife comes with a matching blade guard.
feature_bullets: Ceramic Coating for Easy Non-Stick Slicing
Color Coding Helps You to Reduce the Risk of Cross-Contamination During Food Preparation
8" Chef Knife is a multipurpose knife for mincing and slicing vegetables. The 7" Santoku Knife is perfect multipurpose knife for dicing and mincing

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars588 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
